item.title: American distillers hoping for favorable trade deals amid Trump's tariffs: 'Industry should be immune'
item.description: American distillers hope the U.S. will reach a trade deal with Canada and Mexico by the end of the week as inconsistent trade talks complicate plannin...

item.title: Federal Reserve holds key interest rate steady for fifth straight meeting despite Trump's pressure
item.description: The Fed left its benchmark interest rate unchanged following its July policy meeting amid uncertainty over the impact of tariffs on inflation and econ...

item.title: Retirees face staggering 6-figure health care bill when leaving the workforce
item.description: A Fidelity study shows 65-year-old retirees need $172,500 for healthcare costs, with Medicare coverage gaps requiring supplemental insurance planning.

item.title: United Airlines, JetBlue partnership gets Trump admin clearance to fly
item.description: DOT reviewed a United Airlines and JetBlue partnership after Spirit Airlines opposed the deal, with seven daily round-trip flights planned for JFK air...

item.title: NYC office shooting raises new corporate security concerns for business leaders
item.description: The mass shooting at a Manhattan office building raises new concerns for business leaders looking to secure their staff and buildings from threats.
